image:image.image:title: Moon in the blue sky

image:image.image:title: Twilight over IIT Guwahati
image:image.image:caption: Twilight in cloudy weather with the sun hidden behind clouds, viewed from Lohit Hostel, featuring Siang Hostel, the cricket ground, and IIT Guwahati campus nestled among surrounding hills.
image:image.image:geo_location: IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

image:image.image:title: Afternoon Clouds over Hills
image:image.image:caption: Clouds and landscape viewed from a flight from Guwahati to Bagdogra Airport in the afternoon. Greens, hills, and small water streams are visible. Captured with a Redmi A4 5G.
image:image.image:geo_location: En route: Guwahati to Bagdogra, India

image:image.image:title: Full Moon over IIT Guwahati

image:image.image:title: Post-Rainview from Lohit Hostel
image:image.image:caption: Captured on October 1, 2025, after rainfall from Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati. Clear cloudy skies, high visibility, and lush greenery around the hills are visible, with water puddles covering the helipad and cricket ground.
image:image.image:geo_location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

image:image.image:geo_location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

image:image.image:title: Sunset at IIT Guwahati Lake

image:image.image:title: Moon Lamp
image:image.image:caption: A glowing crystal moon lamp showing the moon’s surface in fine detail, captured at night in my room at Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati. The texture beautifully reflects the moon’s craters when lit.
image:image.image:geo_location: Lohit Hostel, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India

image:image.image:title: Solar System Lamp

image:image.image:title: Glowing Trees at Core III Garden
image:image.image:caption: A beautiful view of the Core III garden at IIT Guwahati during twilight, where trees were decorated with glowing lights that illuminated the grassy garden between office buildings. Captured just as darkness was setting in, highlighting the serene and festive ambiance.
image:image.image:geo_location: Core III Garden, IIT Guwahati, Assam, India
